# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Validation

- [ ] I ran relevant tests/checks locally
- [ ] CI should pass for linting and validation workflows

## Documentation

- [ ] I reviewed documentation blast radius for this change
- [ ] I updated docs/docstrings/comments where behavior or contracts changed
- [ ] I updated onboarding or command docs if developer workflow changed
- [ ] I added or updated tests/examples for documented behavior when applicable

## Security and Sensitive Content

- [ ] No secrets/credentials/tokens were added to docs, comments, code, or examples
- [ ] No sensitive operational details were added to broad-access docs without redaction/control

## Change Type

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs-only
- [ ] Security/compliance
